DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of combined 5-FU and low molecular weight heparin in infusion on the rate of retinal redetachment after silicone oil removal in cases of proliferative vitreoretinopathy (PVR).
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of 5-FU and LMW Heparin on the Rate of Retinal Redetachment After Silicone Oil Removal in Cases of PVR
DOC.criteria: Cases with history of vitrectomy and silicone oil injection for management of PVR who undergo silicone oil removal any sign of retinal redetachment before silicone oil removal any sign of diabetic retinopathy
